statements: DELETE FROM geothermal_research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM geothermal_research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' AND publication_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM research_publications WHERE publication_author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE institution_name = 'University of Science';
DELETE FROM publications WHERE publication_type = 'Journal' AND publication_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Research_Teams WHERE team_name = 'Geothermal Explorers';
DELETE FROM Research_Teams WHERE team_name = 'Geothermal Research Team' AND team_department = 'Geology';
DELETE FROM ResearchProjects WHERE project_id = 100 AND lead_researcher = 'John Doe'
